original_text: Even though Elnathan, Delaiah and Gemariah urged the king not to burn the scroll, he would not listen to them.
korean_text: 엘라단과 들라야와 그마랴가 왕께 두루마리를 불사르지 말도록 아뢰어도 왕이 듣지 아니하였으며

sentences.original_text: Even though Elnathan, Delaiah and Gemariah urged the king
sentences.korean_translation: 엘라다단과 델라야와 게마리아가 왕을 권하였음에도 불구하고

sentences.original_text: he would not listen to them
